name: Basse Def Adventures
overview: Basse Def Adventures is the 8-bit adaptation of the BD Basse Def produced by Jibé (Jean-Baptiste Pollien). It will be a platform game (6 varied worlds) developed by Broke Studio (Twin Dragons) and with graphics designed by Jibé himself. The two heroes (Ludo and Simon will be interchangeable during the game). All in physical format on NES cartridge, with case, box and instructions as at the time!
